subject: p19016834
History: AF. Patient with esophageal carcinoma and pneumonia.
Findings: Comparison is made with prior study,. Cardiomediastinal contours are unchanged. Esophageal stent is in unchanged position. Right lower lobe pneumonic consolidation is unchanged.
